name: Point Clicker
description:
This game is just about clicking to gain points.

To gain points, you must buy generators and upgrade your clicking and production efficiency.

Disclaimer:

This may be not fun due to the lack of graphics and sound, and this is my first ever project so I would love to share it with all of you. I made this game to maybe bring entertainment to you all. Please report any bugs that you see I would gladly try to resolve them.

Thanks.
